resources.string:
I'm a software designer, creator of the Pied Piper app and algorithm, and the protagonist in HBO's Silicon Valley. 

I invented and built the start-up Pied Piper, a program designed to find music matches, while living at Erlich's Hacker Hostel alongside his best friend Big Head and fellow geeks Dinesh and Gilfoyle. Pied Piper's compression algorithm triggered a bidding war and ultimately garnered funding from Peter Gregory's company Raviga. 

We won the TechCrunch Disrupt and $50,000.
